sentences.sentence: There are moments - moments of crisis for the hegemonic discourse - when one should take the risk of provoking the disintegration of appearances.
sentences.translation: 存在这样的时刻——对霸权话语来说的危机时刻——这个时候，人们必须承担使表象崩解的风险。

sentences.sentence: No other part of the world has enjoyed the same level of continuous hegemonic concern.
sentences.translation: 世界上没有其他地区，享有同等级别的，持续的霸权关注。

sentences.sentence: History has shown that if a country's national prestige skyrockets, it can free itself from a conflict with an existing hegemonic power.
sentences.translation: 历史已经表明，如果一个国家的威望高涨，它就可以摆脱与一个现存霸权国家的冲突。
